txamusic_browser_not_found: No browser found to open link
txamusic_permissions_desc: This app needs access to storage to play music and notifications to control playback.
txamusic_permission_notification_desc: Show playback controls in the notification bar.
txamusic_permission_storage_message: Needed to find and play music files on your device.
txamusic_permission_write_settings_desc: Required for volume control and audio features.
txamusic_permission_location_desc: Used to determine your local timezone for date and time synchronization.
txamusic_permission_location_required_de: Location permission is mandatory to synchronize the music library dates and application timezone correctly. Please grant it in settings (choose 'While using the app').
txamusic_permission_system_alert_desc: Required for the custom toast system to display messages on any screen.
txamusic_permission_alarm_desc: Allow app to schedule holiday notifications and reminders at exact times.
txamusic_scan_desc: Files shorter than %d seconds are skipped.
txamusic_lang_vi: HOANG SA & TRUONG SA BELONG TO VIETNAM
txamusic_settings_section_visual_desc: Customize colors, dark mode, and app accent.
txamusic_settings_section_audio_desc: Equalizer, smooth transitions, and audio focus.
txamusic_settings_section_personalize_de: Artist/Album grid styles and functionality tabs.
txamusic_settings_section_images_desc: Cover art quality and display options.
txamusic_settings_section_other_desc: Backup your library and manage cache.
txamusic_settings_section_update_info_de: Current version, check for updates, and developer info.
txamusic_settings_theme_desc: Switch between light and dark mode.
txamusic_settings_accent_desc: Choose your favorite app highlight color.
txamusic_settings_grid_desc: Set number of columns for lists.
txamusic_settings_eq_not_found: No equalizer found on this device
txamusic_settings_eq_no_session: No audio session. Play a song first.
txamusic_settings_fade_dialog_desc: Smoothly fade out the current song and fade in the next.
txamusic_settings_audio_focus_desc: Pause when other apps play audio
txamusic_settings_bluetooth_desc: Auto resume when Bluetooth device connects
txamusic_settings_headset_desc: Auto play when headphones are plugged in
txamusic_settings_audio_fade_desc: Fade audio when song is paused or played
txamusic_settings_audio_fade_dialog_desc: Duration to fade in/out when toggling playback.
txamusic_eq_limit_warning: Warning: Exceeding ¬±15dB may distort audio on some devices.
txamusic_settings_eq_play_first: Play a song first to use the equalizer
txamusic_settings_playback_speed_desc: Adjust the speed of the music (0.5x to 2.0x).

txamusic_device_not_supported_desc: This app requires Android %s or higher. Your device is running Android %s.
txamusic_android9_warning_body: You are using Android 9. Due to system memory constraints on this version, the app may occasionally experience lag or stability issues when loading high-quality album art.
txamusic_android9_warning_how_to_fix: üí° To improve performance: Clear the app cache or restart the app if it becomes slow.
txamusic_android9_warning_footer: If problems persist, consider upgrading your OS or device for the best experience.
txamusic_root_modal_body: Hello! We detected that your powerful device **%s** is running with **Root Privileges** (Android %s). TXA Music can now leverage peak performance and advanced file system access for an even smoother experience.
txamusic_root_modal_footer: Root access granted. Ready for high-performance audio.
txamusic_ram_warning_body: This app requires at least %s RAM to run smoothly. Your device only has %s total RAM. You may experience freezes or crashes.
txamusic_low_mem_body: Available RAM is critically low (%s). Please free up memory.

txamusic_holiday_mung3_body: Today is for friends and teachers. Enjoy the festivities!
txamusic_holiday_mung4_body: Let the positive energy of spring stay with you all year long.
